casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Reid Wilburn McLaughlin No. 137P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016 Marilyn G. Ozer, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, For McLaughlin, Reid Wilburn. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 29th of April 2016 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
